## selectionFor variable

Returns a selection regardless of whether anything is tagged in the provided doc

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
selectionFor: <GSchema extends Schema<string, string> = any>(taggedDoc: pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<GSchema>) => Selection<GSchema>
```
